data.text: @rontkim Hochel needs to investigate the situation with Cuomo! The once Gov.Of NY! Hochel  needs a backbone to get to the bottom of this! Seniors shouldn’t have to die, because of incompetence on behalf of the Cuomo! The question is why?
@rontkim Hochul has no empathy. Pure Evil
@rontkim You are so right. She's useless. If NY is smart she will be gone next election.
@rontkim Cuomo redux. She’s just as bad.
